rows.label: qev030501_MSG0001
rows.name: Thea! Have you eaten today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0002
rows.name:
I know how you feel. But you must care for yourself.
It is important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0003
rows.name: I know. Thank you. I am all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0004
rows.name:
You are not. You never dance as you once did.
That is proof.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Hmm? Are you BLADE?
One finally comes to our aid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev030501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Hala what she needs done.

rows.label: qev030501_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev030501_SEL0021
rows.name: Show concern for the clearly depressed Thea.

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0006
rows.name:
You must lay fallen warrior to rest. He was Quegga.
Thea was to be his mate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0007
rows.name:
He stayed in Oblivia and fought Ganglion so we might
escape. He died as proud warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0008
rows.name:
He deserves Prone death-custom of spirit rest.
He must become flesh and blood of mighty beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0009
rows.name:
His body must be eaten. Then he will know peace.
Then Thea will know peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0010
rows.name: She was betrothed. He was killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0011
rows.name:
He was brave warrior. He was called Quegga.
He stayed in Oblivia and held back our pursuers.
He died protecting woman he loved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0012
rows.name:
He deserves proper send-off.
For this, I need BLADE assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0013
rows.name:
But you are busy. Must be busy.
All this time, no one responds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0014
rows.name:
But now you have come.
Please give Thea comfort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0015
rows.name:
Please feed Quegga's body to mighty beast.
This is proper. This is Prone way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0016
rows.name: Be careful. Cavern Clan scum still prowl Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0017
rows.name:
They are strong. They stop us laying Quegga to rest.
It is hard to wait. Hard for all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0018
rows.name: Aunt Hala? [ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] will return Quegga to beasts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0019
rows.name: Yes! Then Quegga's spirit can depart for new lands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0020
rows.name:
You must also move on. You have gift of dance.
You must share it with world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0021
rows.name:
No. Quegga is not here to see.
Dancing will bring only emptiness. Pain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Thea is skilled in dances of Prone. But she is poor girl.
Stubborn girl.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0023
rows.name:
For many suns, she captured hearts of clansmen with
dance. But now nothing. Not since that day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0024
rows.name:
It is sad waste. You must agree.
You must also want to see such beauty![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev030501_SEL0031
rows.name: Express interest in seeing Thea dance.

rows.label: qev030501_JNK0040
rows.name: Brush Off

rows.label: qev030501_SEL0041
rows.name: Explain that dancing isn't really your...thing.

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0025
rows.name:
Of course. Yes. All more reason to lay Quegga to rest.
Then her heart is free. She can dance once more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0026
rows.name: Yours is dry life. Are all BLADEs so joyless?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0027
rows.name:
No matter. You only need to do job.
Your life is your business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0028
rows.name:
Contact me when you find Quegga's body.
It is in Oblivia. In Barbarich Desert.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0029
rows.name: I will explain details of Prone funeral then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0030
rows.name:
Quegga's body is in Barbarich Desert.
He stopped Ganglion there. He let us escape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0031
rows.name:
He was brave fool. Bighearted fool.
He left behind fine woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0032
rows.name:
He deserves to be fed to beast.
Beast as large and reckless as him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0033
rows.name: Go find his body. Then contact me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0034
rows.name:
I ask you to find Quegga's gift.
I ask you to send off Quegga's spirit.
I ask much of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0035
rows.name:
It brings Thea comfort. She deserves comfort.
The world deserves to see her dance again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0036
rows.name: Have you sent Quegga on, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0037
rows.name: I see. He has become flesh of falsaxum. Very good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0038
rows.name:
Now you must retrieve what he left behind.
It is in Scabland Fortress. Good luck. Be safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0039
rows.name: Have you sent Quegga on, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0040
rows.name: I see. He has become flesh of falsaxum. Very good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0041
rows.name:
His body has been devoured by powerful beast.
Now his soul will know peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0042
rows.name: ...And item he hid? Have you found that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: NewText_75
rows.name: This... Oh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0043
rows.name:
Thea! Look! Fool Quegga left this for you.
Then stood against Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0044
rows.name: ...It is dancer's costume.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0045
rows.name:
When Ganglion captured us, he had gift for me.
He made it in secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0046
rows.name: ...It was this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0047
rows.name:
Poor girl. Quegga is no longer with us.
But you know what he tells you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0048
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0049
rows.name: Poor girl. Foolish girl.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0050
rows.name:
You found this, [ST:playername ].
Tell her what it means.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_JNK0050
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev030501_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that Quegga wished for Thea to keep dancing.

rows.label: qev030501_JNK0060
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev030501_SEL0061
rows.name: Stay silent as Thea grasps for words.

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0051
rows.name: Ah... Ahhh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0052
rows.name:
I know. Of course I know.
I know him better than any spirit in this world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0053
rows.name: He loved my dancing more than anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0054
rows.name: But I ran away. I betrayed him in grief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0055
rows.name: Thea...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0056
rows.name:
I will be reborn. I will take name of beast that
consumed his spirit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0057
rows.name:
I am Thea Falsaxum!
I will dance until last ember of my spirit goes dark![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0058
rows.name: Brave girl! How I have waited for those words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0059
rows.name: Thank you. Thea found her strength because of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030501_MSG0060
rows.name: Please take this. ...And come see her dance soon![ST:wait ]
